item.title: Smile 2's Peter Jacobson On Joining Horror Franchise, Character With Knowledge Of The Smiler's Rules & House
item.description: Smile 2 star Peter Jacobson opens up about joining the viral horror franchise, his character with insight on The Smiler and a House revival.

item.title: Tom Holland's New Christopher Nolan Movie Role Is More Exciting Than His Spider-Man Return
item.description: Tom Holland has joined the cast of Christopher Nolan's next movie, and the role is more exciting for the actor than returning as Spider-Man.

item.title: Depravity's Victoria Justice & Devon Ross On Unpredictable Thriller, Fight Scenes And Filming First Intimate Scene
item.description: Depravity stars Victoria Justice and Devon Ross talk the twisty thriller, building their friendship, fight scenes and Justice's first intimate scene.
